lines.text: Remember that a few years ago, you play albums backwards there are satanic messages? Let me tell you something, if you've ever sat around playing your albums backwards, you are Satan.

[yelling loudly]
Fuck that! I want my rockstars dead! I want 'em to fucking play with one hand and put a gun in their other fucking hand and go, "I hope you enjoyed the show. Bang!" Yes! Yes! Play from your fucking heart!... I am available for children's parties, by the way.
I find it ironic that people who are against things that cause sexual thoughts are generally fundamentalist Christians who also believe you should be fruitful and multiply.
I'm down south recently. I'm playing a town called Fyffe, Alabama. All right, that's right outside Sputnumburg, for those of you all who need a point of reference.

[about the Gulf War]
It was a very stressful time for me, the war. I'll tell you why - I was in the unenviable position of being for the war, but against the troops. And ah... Not the most popular stance I've ever taken on an issue.

I'm Bill Hicks and I'm dead now, 'cause I smoke cigarettes. Cigarettes didn't kill me - a bunch of non-smokers kicked the shit out of me one night. I tried to run - they had more energy than I, I tried to hide - they heard me wheezing.

I can speak for every guy here in this room tonight. Guys, if you could blow yourselves, ladies, you'd be in this room alone right now... watching an empty stage. Boy, my folks are proud of me. "Bill, honey, you still doing that suck-your-own-cock bit?"
Did you know if you play New Kids on the Block records backwards... they sound better?
[about three rednecks who met him after a show where he made a joke about Christians]

[imitating them]
"Hey buddy, we're Christians, we don't like what you said."

[in his own voice]
I said "Then forgive me".
You have to admit, beliefs are odd. A lot of Christians wear crosses around their necks. Do you think when Jesus comes back he ever wants to see a fucking cross?
It's an insane world, but I'm proud to be apart of it.
[Hicks takes out a cigarette]
I do smoke, if this smoke bothers anyone I recommend you looking around at the world we live in and... shutting your fucking mouth
[Hicks laughs, drops his cigarette but catches it in an instant and puts it back in his mouth]
I doubt it. How many- Oh, oh, how many non-smokers are here tonight. Non-smokers. By round of applause. Let's here the non-smokers
[Audience claps]
. Good.
[Audience laughs]

Cause I have something I want to tell you and I'm glad you all conglomerated here tonight. Save me some breath, which is obviously very short. I love- I'm gonna to tell you non-smokers something right now that I know for a fact you don't know and I delight in telling my brothers things they don't know... particularly when they're true, which this is. Ready? Non-smokers? Ready? Drum roll.
[makes a drum roll with his lips]
Non-smokers die... everyday.
[Hicks and audience laughs]
Sleep tight.
[Audience laughs and Hicks takes a puff of his cigarette]
You see, I know you entertain some type of eternal life fantasy, because you've chosen not to smoke. Let me be the first to
[Hicks mimics a gun shot with the microphone]
pop that fucking bubble, and send you hurtling back to reality. You're dead too. And you know what doctors say, "Shit if only you had smoked, we have the technology to help ya."
[Audience laughs]
Oxygen lung, tents. It's like going to Sharper Image when I die.
